title: Fleuve
description:
_French: a river_

- Create flows by connecting cards.

## Take a quick tutorial

- Press ➡️ ➡️ to activate the next card.

title: This is a card
description:
## Nice!

- Now press ⬇️ to select the card below.
- Press Space or Enter to activate it.

title: A sibling card
description:
## Well done!

Now activate the card below to learn about editing cards.

title: Editing cards
description:
- Press Tab to edit the title.
- Press D to edit the description.
- Press Tab when you're done.

Go ➡️ to learn about Markdown formatting, or ⬇️ to continue.

title: Deleting cards
description:
## Delete me! It’s okay, I don’t mind.

- Press delete to remove a card.
- You’ll be asked to confirm before the card is removed.

title: Infinite levels
description:
## Drill, drill drill

- Press ➡️ to drill down through the hierarchy.
- Press ⬅️ to drill back up.

title: Deeper still
description: Okay, that's far enough. Go back! ⬅️

title: Reorder cards
description:
## Up, down, left, right

- Press Shift ⬆️ to move a card up.
- Press Shift ⬇️ to move it down.
- Press Shift ⬅️ to move a card left.
- Press Shift ➡️ to move it right.

title: Rearrange me
description: I'm just here for practice. Press Shift with the arrow keys and watch me move.

title: Add more cards
description:
- Press ➡️ and enter a title to connect a card to this one.
- Press ⬇️ to add a card connected to the same card as this one.

_That's it! When you’re ready, press ⬅️ and delete this tutorial flow._

title: Markdown styles
description:
_You can use markdown in card descriptions. Double-click to edit._

# Header 1
For the important stuff.

## Header 2
Slightly less important.

### Header 3
Bold sans, same size as regular text.

#### Header 4
Sans, same size as regular text.

##### Header 5
Small caps bold.

###### Header 6
Small caps regular.

## Bulleted lists
- Dash space makes a list item.
- Add multiple items
- Here's another item
  - With a nested list
  - Ooh, neat!

## Ordered lists
1. Numbered items get numbered
2. This is the second item.
3. And this is the third.

title: Insert cards
description:
Press Option/Alt ➡️ to move a card to the right, inserting a new card to the left.

Press Option/Alt ⬅️ to move a card left, replacing its parent. _The parent card will be replaced only if it's empty._
